triples.evidence: In MRI, the same idea holds. The RF signal has to be applied at the exact precessional frequency-the Larmor frequency.

triples.o: applying a force at the right frequency
triples.evidence: That is resonance: applying a force at the right frequency so that every push adds up.
So the revolving door is a nice analogy: push in rhythm with the rotation, and the system responds strongly.
